entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
